description: A legendary island said to be home to incredible food creatures. The island is revealed to actually be a giant natural pudding à la mode, with rivers made of cream, ground made from pudding, and various edible terrain features. Ancient texts confused the kanji for 'bird' and 'island', leading people to search for a Hungry-La Bird rather than the island itself.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Discover Hungry-La Island
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew discovers the legendary Hungry-La Island while searching for food supplies.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the main location for the crossover special.

keyEvents.title: Island's True Nature Revealed
keyEvents.description: An eruption reveals that the entire island is actually one giant dessert - a natural pudding à la mode.
keyEvents.significance: Major revelation about the island's composition and the reason it was legendary.

statusHistory.reason: Island exists as a natural food formation
